articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Spotify is finally launching support for lossless music streaming - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify is finally launching lossless music streaming support after consumers demanded it for years.
articles.content:
Spotify is finally launching high-quality, lossless music streaming support for premium account holders after years of waiting.
The company first talked about a hi-fi tier in 2021 — which would offe… [+2186 chars]
